Question: Razer CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Razer

Product 1

- Razer Sensa HD Haptics showcased on Project Esther concept
- Blurs boundaries between physical reality and virtual world
- World's first HD Haptics Gaming Cushion
- Razer Sensa technology for immersive gaming experience

Product 2

- Razer Blade 16: World's first OLED 240Hz 16" display
- Intel Core i9-14900HX processor
- Up to NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 graphics
- Slim anodized aluminum unibody form factor
- NVIDIA Studio technology and NVIDIA Studio drivers

Product 3

- Razer Blade 14: Updated with AMD Ryzen 9 8945HS processor
- Up to NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 Laptop Graphics
- QHD+ 240Hz display
- Upgradable DDR5 memory and USB4 and Wi-Fi 7 connectivity

Product 4

- Razer Blade 18: Features world's first 4K 165Hz 18” display
- Supports Thunderbolt™5 for high performance connectivity
- Offers unparalleled performance and versatility

Product 5

- Razer USB C Dock: Portable 11-port USB C dock
- Compatible with Windows and Mac laptops and desktops
- Offers seamless connectivity and maximum performance

Product 6

- Razer Iskur V2 Gaming Chair: 6D Adjustable and Adaptive Lumbar Support System
- High-density foam cushions and EPU-grade synthetic leather
- Reactive seat tilt and up to 152-degree recline functionality

Product 7

- Razer Aether Monitor Light Bar: Dual lighting with front-facing and rear-facing LEDs
- Ultra-high Color Rendering Index (CRI) of 95
- Razer Chroma RGB integration for dynamic and reactive environment
